animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love to eat peanuts. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I am a very large animal.
🥜 I am sometimes found in a circus.
💧 I can use my trunk to spray water.

animal.question: I say 'Meow' and love to chase mice. I purr when I'm happy. Who am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I like to play with yarn.

animal.question: I have a wagging tail and love to play fetch. I bark loudly. Who am I?
I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦓 You might see me with zebras.

animal.question: I quack and swim in the pond. I might lay an egg. Who am I?
I roar and live in the jungle. I am known as the king of the jungle. Who am I?
I hop and have a pouch for my baby. Who am I?

hints.text: 👶 My baby is called a joey.

animal.question: I slither and have no legs. Some of us are poisonous. Who am I?
I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. Who am I?
I live in the ocean and have eight arms. Some of us can squirt ink. Who am I?

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm cold and white. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am made of frozen water.
🧤 You need to wear gloves when I'm around.
☃️ You can build a snowman with me.

weather.question: I am wet and fall from the sky. I help plants grow. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ You need an umbrella when I fall.

weather.question: I'm hot and yellow and shine in the sky. I help keep you warm. What am I?

hints.text: 😎 You wear sunglasses when I am bright.
🌻 Flowers turn their faces towards me.

weather.question: I blow and can be gentle or strong. I can move leaves from trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I move the branches of trees.

weather.question: I am a white fluffy thing that floats in the sky. I can bring rain or sunshine. What am I?

hints.text: 🌧️ I can turn grey when it will rain.

weather.question: I am a storm with very strong winds that spins around. I have an eye in the middle. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I am a type of cyclone.
🌊 I usually form over warm ocean water.

weather.question: I am a sudden spark of electricity in the sky. I am often followed by a loud boom. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I am dangerous and you should go inside when I appear.
⛈️ I often happen during a thunderstorm.
💡 Scientists study me to learn about electricity.

weather.question: I am frozen rain that falls from the sky. I am hard and can be small or big. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am not snow, but also frozen water.
🤕 It hurts if I hit you!
⚾ Sometimes I can be the size of a golf ball or bigger.

weather.question: I am a giant rotating column of air that touches both the ground and a cloud. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I am often called a twister.
💨 I can pick up cars and houses.
🌽 I am most common in the Midwest, especially in corn fields!

weather.question: I am a colorful arch in the sky that appears after it rains. I am made of sunlight and water droplets. What am I?

hints.text: 🍀 Some people believe there is a pot of gold at my end.
💧 I show up after rain when the sun peeks out.
